title: EP 58. 40 Acres and a Question
description: As reparations for African Americans come closer to being a reality, the conversation has led to a question - who should get paid? We’ll explore that question of eligibility and hear different perspectives from people pondering it, and people who have clear ideas of what the answer should be. Plus- Hana, Leila and producer Natalie have an honest chat about what this all means for them.
itunes:title: 40 Acres and a Question
itunes:subtitle: When it comes to reparations, not everyone agrees on who should get paid.
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
